alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Cumberland; Fluvanna; Goochland; Louisa; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 4:16PM EST until January 09 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Louisa County in central Virginia... Northeastern Cumberland County in central Virginia... Goochland County in central Virginia... North central Amelia County in central Virginia... Western Powhatan County in central Virginia... Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 500 PM EST. * At 416 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Monticello to near Cumberland, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Palmyra, Fork Union, Lake Monticello, Columbia, Duncan, Troy, and Lakeside Village around 420 PM EST. Cartersville, Boswells Tavern, Kents Store, and Trenholm around 425 PM EST. Hadensville, Ferncliff, and Fife around 430 PM EST. Goochland, Louisa, and Gum Spring around 435 PM EST. Mineral around 440 PM EST. Bumpass around 450 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Orchid, Maidens, Three Square, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Whiteville, Michaux, West View, Grays Siding, and Wares Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Cumberland; Fluvanna; Goochland; Louisa; Powhatan
